observations: Edit post functionality is NOT available in the UI - posts only show Like, Comment, Unsubscribe, Remove, and Pin options. This appears to be by design as the Activity Stream is intended for immutable social posts rather than editable content.

Privacy level selection UI was not visible during testing. The feature description mentions privacy settings (Everyone, Community, Friends, Private) but no UI element to select privacy was observed in the basic post creation flow.
Posts are attributed to 'Anonymous' in the feed despite being logged in as SuperUser Account. This may be related to profile configuration.
Empty posts are allowed - the system does not prevent users from creating posts with no content, which could lead to spam or poor user experience.
The contenteditable div approach for post input required special handling (keyboard.type) rather than standard input methods.
